Government Initiatives.name: NIST
Government Initiatives.description: Leading the standardization of quantum-resistant encryption algorithms, which will become essential for future cryptographic systems. Services aligned with these standards will be critical for organizations seeking quantum resistance.

Government Initiatives.name: Department Of Homeland Security DHS
Government Initiatives.description: The Department of Homeland Security (DHS), in partnership with the Department of Commerce’s National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST), has released a roadmap to help organizations protect their data and systems and to reduce risks related to the advancement of quantum computing technology.

Government Initiatives.name: European Commission
Government Initiatives.description: Recommendation on a Coordinated Implementation Roadmap for the transition to Post-Quantum Cryptography.

Government Initiatives.name: Australian Strategic Policy Institute - ASPI
Government Initiatives.description: An Australian strategy for the quantum revolution.

Government Initiatives.name: KpqC Competition Round 2
Government Initiatives.description: South Korea open national post-quantum cryptography standards competition.

Government Initiatives.name: New Zealand Information Security Manual
Government Initiatives.description: The New Zealand Information Security Manual (NZISM) is the New Zealand Government's manual on information assurance and information systems security.

Blockchain.name: The Quantum Resistant Ledger - QRL
Blockchain.description: Private digital monies must be secure against computing advances to achieve longevity. The design and issuance of a cryptocurrency ledger utilising hash-based digital signatures which are resistant to classical and quantum computing attack is presented.

Blockchain.name: ETH - Ethereum Research
Blockchain.description: How to hard-fork to save most users’ funds in a quantum emergency

Blockchain.name: BTC - BIP: QuBit - P2QRH spending rules
Blockchain.description: This proposal aims to improve the quantum resistance of Bitcoin's signature security should the Discrete Logarithm Problem which secures Elliptic Curve Cryptography (EC DLP) no longer prove to be computationally hard, likely through quantum advantage by cryptographically-relevant quantum computers (CRQCs).

Quantum-Resistant Services and Applicati.name: DigiCert
Quantum-Resistant Services and Applicati.description: Weathering the transition to a quantum-safe posture will require organizations to adapt and scale the way they manage digital certificates. At the same time, they will need to migrate their cryptography to approved quantum-safe algorithms – potentially multiple times as the standards evolve. It is critical to develop now the ability to continuously discover and manage certificates at scale.

Quantum-Resistant Services and Applicati.name: Siemens - PoQsiKom
Quantum-Resistant Services and Applicati.description: The PoQsiKom project is developing one of the essential foundations for enabling the long-term secure, sovereign, and efficient networking of operating technology in Industry 4.0 and thus ensuring a high level of interoperability.

Quantum-Resistant Services and Applicati.name: OpenSSH
Quantum-Resistant Services and Applicati.description: OpenSSH 9.0 using the hybrid Streamlined NTRU Prime + x25519 key exchange method by default. Version 9.9 adds mlkem768x25519-sha256 by default.

Quantum-Resistant Services and Applicati.name: Post-Quantum WireGuard
Quantum-Resistant Services and Applicati.description: In this paper, we present PQ-WireGuard, a post-quantum variant of the handshake in the WireGuard VPN protocol.

Quantum-Resistant Services and Applicati.name: CRYSTALS-Dilithium Python Implementation
Quantum-Resistant Services and Applicati.description: This repository contains a pure python implementation of both: ML-DSA - FIPS 204 Dilithium and CRYSTALS-Dilithium: following (at the time of writing) the most recent specification (v3.1)

Quantum-Resistant Services and Applicati.name: Apple iMessage
Quantum-Resistant Services and Applicati.description: iMessage with PQ3: The new state of the art in quantum-secure messaging at scale.

Quantum-Resistant Services and Applicati.name: Signal
Quantum-Resistant Services and Applicati.description: Quantum Resistance and the Signal Protocol.

Quantum-Resistant Services and Applicati.name: Google Chrome
Quantum-Resistant Services and Applicati.description: Protecting Chrome Traffic with Hybrid Kyber KEM.

Quantum-Resistant Services and Applicati.name: Wolf SSL
Quantum-Resistant Services and Applicati.description: Everything wolfSSL is Preparing for Post-Quantum as of Spring 2024

Quantum-Resistant Services and Applicati.name: Palo Alto
Quantum-Resistant Services and Applicati.description: Palo Alto Networks Quantum Safe VPN Supports New NIST Standards and Enables Crypto-Agility

Quantum-Resistant Services and Applicati.name: SignServer
Quantum-Resistant Services and Applicati.description: Quantum-ready code signing - As of right now, SignServer supports ML_DSA (Dilithium) and SLH-DSA (SPHINCS+) algorithms for CMS and raw signing.

Toolkits and Libraries.name: Open Quantum Safe
Toolkits and Libraries.description: Software for the transition to quantum-resistant cryptography.

Toolkits and Libraries.name: AWS Post-Quantum Cryptography
Toolkits and Libraries.description: Bringing quantum-resistance to AWS services and customers.

Toolkits and Libraries.name: AMD - ML-DSA Crypto Core
Toolkits and Libraries.description: The MLDS-B235 IP Core implements the NIST Module-Lattice-Based Digital Signature Standard (ML-DSA) in FPGA, SoC, and ASIC technologies.

Toolkits and Libraries.name: ML-DSA
Toolkits and Libraries.description: Module-Lattice-based Digital Signature Standard (draft) standard by NIST

Toolkits and Libraries.name: ML-DSA FIA Demo
Toolkits and Libraries.description: This code demonstrates fault injection analysis (FIA) attacks and countermeasures on Module Lattice Digital Signature Algorithm (ML-DSA). ML-DSA is based on Dilithium.

Toolkits and Libraries.name: RustCrypto: ML-KEM
Toolkits and Libraries.description: Pure Rust implementation of the Module-Lattice-Based Key-Encapsulation Mechanism Standard (formerly known as Kyber) as described in the FIPS 203 Initial Public Draft.

Toolkits and Libraries.name: RustCrypto: ML-DSA
Toolkits and Libraries.description: Pure Rust implementation of the Module-Lattice-Based Digital Signature Standard (ML-DSA) as described in the FIPS-204 Initial Public Draft (WIP).

Toolkits and Libraries.name: RustCrypto: SLH-DSA
Toolkits and Libraries.description: Pure Rust implementation of the SLH-DSA (aka SPHINCS+) signature scheme. Implemented based on the FIPS-205 Inital Public Draft.

Toolkits and Libraries.name: GO - mlkem768
Toolkits and Libraries.description: Package mlkem768 implements the quantum-resistant key encapsulation method ML-KEM (formerly known as Kyber).

Toolkits and Libraries.name: OpenJDK
Toolkits and Libraries.description: As defined in Java Enhancement Proposals JEP497 for ML-DSA (ML-DSA-44, ML-DSA-65, and ML-DSA-87 standardized in FIPS 204) and JEP496 for ML-KEM. In the OpenJDK JCE provider since Java 24.

Toolkits and Libraries.name: Bouncy Castle – Open-source cryptographic APIs
Toolkits and Libraries.description: Bouncy Castle for Java and C# .Net. Crypto library supporting a wide range of standard and draft quantum-resitant algorithms and formats.

Post-Quantum Research and Resources.name: IBM Quantum-safe software solutions
Post-Quantum Research and Resources.description: IBM Quantum Safe™ technology is a comprehensive set of tools, capabilities, and approaches for securing your enterprise for the quantum future.

Post-Quantum Research and Resources.name: Post-Quantum Cryptography Alliance
Post-Quantum Research and Resources.description: Drive the advancement and adoption of post-quantum cryptography.

Post-Quantum Research and Resources.name: Post-Quantum
Post-Quantum Research and Resources.description: Helping organizations become quantum-safe across their entire digital footprint.

Post-Quantum Research and Resources.name: Post-Quantum Cryptography Coalition (PQCC)
Post-Quantum Research and Resources.description: Accelerating adoption of quantum-secure cryptography in the real world.

Post-Quantum Research and Resources.name: The International Association for Cryptologic Research (IACR)
Post-Quantum Research and Resources.description: The International Association for Cryptologic Research (IACR) is a non-profit scientific organization whose purpose is to further research in cryptology and related fields. Cryptology is the science and practice of designing computation and communication systems which are secure in the presence of adversaries.

Post-Quantum Research and Resources.name: IEEE Standards Association (IEEE SA)
Post-Quantum Research and Resources.description: Recommended Practice for Post-Quantum Cryptography Migration.

Post-Quantum Research and Resources.name: Post-Quantum Almanach (Bouncy Castle)
Post-Quantum Research and Resources.description: Algorithm comparision, state of standardisation and implementation examples (PDF).
